select a.act_no accountingNo, a.g_no, a.act_cate_no, act.name cateName, a.title, a.amount, a.reg_Dt, a.status, st.g_no, st.memb_no, st.pay_dt from gms_accounting a inner join gms_accounting_cate act on (a.act_cate_no = act.act_cate_no) left outer join gms_accounting_status st on (a.act_no = st.act_no) where a.act_no=#{no}
